body_html:
I let tf_python.cmake at least ensure the existence of all entries in the filetree.
As suggested by @gunan I wrote a BUILD file to invoke the following:

  • python_modules_test.py to report invalid and missing/expected entries
  • python_proto_test.py to report invalid entries
  • python_proto_cc_test.py to report invalid entries
body_text:
I let tf_python.cmake at least ensure the existence of all entries in the filetree.
As suggested by @gunan I wrote a BUILD file to invoke the following:

python_modules_test.py to report invalid and missing/expected entries
python_proto_test.py to report invalid entries
python_proto_cc_test.py to report invalid entries
body:
I let `tf_python.cmake` at least ensure the existence of all entries in the filetree.
As suggested by @gunan I wrote a `BUILD` file to invoke the following:
- `python_modules_test.py` to report invalid and missing/expected entries
- `python_proto_test.py` to report invalid entries
- `python_proto_cc_test.py` to report invalid entries
